Logo

Use this page to guide your designs and layouts, both online and off, to ensure you're staying consistent with the Securus brand.

###Primary Logos

STACKED LOGO

BOX LOGO

The Securus Technologies corporate logo is the most imme- diate representation of our company, our people, and our brand to the world. It is a valuable corporate asset that must be used consistently in the proper, approved forms.

Our Company logo exists in stacked, box, and landscape versions. While the two options shown above are the preferred primary logos, use of approved alternative logos is acceptable according to their suitability for the layout.

The first word 'SECURUS' is in all caps and the second word "Technologies' is in sentence case. The width of the first word should be the same as the second word.

###Alternative Logo Layouts

Primary Blue

Platinum

Gunmetal

Slate

Black

Reversed Out/White
